item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="07760 06440">turn</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01463" class="">Gog</st>,<n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04031" class="">Magog</st>,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="07218" class="">chief</st> <st data-num="05387" class="">prince</st> of <st data-num="04902" class="">Meshech</st> and <st data-num="08422" class="">Tubal</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="05012" class="">Prophesy</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> him
and say: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am against you, Gog, chief prince of Meshech and Tubal.

I will <st data-num="07725" class="">turn</st> you <st data-num="07725" class="">around</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="02397" class="">hooks</st> into your <st data-num="03895" class="">jaws</st>, and <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> you <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> with <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st>, <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, and <st data-num="06571" class="">horsemen</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="04358" class="">fully</st> <st data-num="03847" class="">armed</st>, a <st data-num="07227" class="">great</st> <st data-num="06951" class="">company</st> with <st data-num="06793 04043">shields of different types</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="08610" class="">armed</st> with <st data-num="02719" class="">swords</st>.

<st data-num="06539" class="">Persia</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03568" class="">Ethiopia</st>, and <st data-num="06316" class="">Put</st><n id="2" /> are <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> them, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them with <st data-num="04043" class="">shields</st> and <st data-num="03553" class="">helmets</st>.
They are joined by Gomer with all its troops and by Beth Togarmah from the remote parts of the north with all its troops—many peoples are with you.
“‘Be ready and stay ready, you and all your companies assembled around you, and be a guard for them.

After <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> you will be <st data-num="06485" class="">summoned</st>; in the <st data-num="0319" class="">latter</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> you will <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">restored</st> from the <st data-num="02719" class="">ravages of war</st>,<n id="1" /> from <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> <st data-num="06908" class="">gathered</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> had <st data-num="08548" class="">long</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> in <st data-num="02723" class="">ruins</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">Its people</st><n id="2" /> were <st data-num="03318" class="">brought out</st> from the <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them will be <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st> <st data-num="0983" class="">securely</st>.
You will advance; you will come like a storm. You will be like a cloud covering the earth, you, all your troops, and the many other peoples with you.
“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: On that day thoughts will come into your mind, and you will devise an evil plan.

You will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “I will <st data-num="05927 05921">invade</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="06519" class="">unwalled towns</st>; I will <st data-num="0935" class="">advance against</st><n id="2" /> those <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st> <st data-num="08252" class="">quietly</st> in <st data-num="0983" class="">security</st>—<st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">without</st> <st data-num="02346" class="">walls</st> and <st data-num="01280" class="">barred</st> <st data-num="01817" class="">gates</st>—

to <st data-num="07997 07998">loot</st> and <st data-num="0962 0957">plunder</st>, to <st data-num="07725 03027 05921">attack</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabited</st> <st data-num="02723" class="">ruins</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0622" class="">gathered</st> from the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>, who are <st data-num="06213" class="">acquiring</st> <st data-num="04735" class="">cattle</st> and <st data-num="07075" class="">goods</st>, who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="02872" class="">center</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>.”

Sheba and Dedan and the traders of Tarshish with all its young warriors will say to you, “Have you come to loot? Have you assembled your armies to plunder, to carry away silver and gold, to take away cattle and goods, to haul away a great amount of spoils?”’
“Therefore, prophesy, son of man, and say to Gog: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: On that day when my people Israel are living securely, you will take notice

and <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> from your <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>, from the <st data-num="03411" class="">remote parts</st> of the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>, <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> and <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="07392" class="">riding</st> on <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, a <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="06951" class="">company</st> and a <st data-num="07227" class="">vast</st> <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st>.

You will advance against my people Israel like a cloud covering the earth. In future days I will bring you against my land so that the nations may acknowledge me, when before their eyes I magnify myself through you, O Gog.
“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Are you the one of whom I spoke in former days by my servants the prophets of Israel, who prophesied in those days that I would bring you against them?
On that day, when Gog invades the land of Israel, declares the Sovereign Lord, my rage will mount up in my anger.

In my <st data-num="07068" class="">zeal</st>, in the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> of my <st data-num="05678" class="">fury</st>,<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="01696" class="">declare</st> <st data-num="0518 03808">that</st> on <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> there will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="07494" class="">earthquake</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.

The <st data-num="01709" class="">fish</st> of the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st>, the <st data-num="05775" class="">birds</st> of the <st data-num="08064" class="">sky</st>, the <st data-num="07704" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">beasts</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07431" class="">things</st> that <st data-num="07430" class="">creep</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">ground</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0120" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> live <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> of the <st data-num="0127" class="">earth</st> will <st data-num="07493" class="">shake</st><n id="1" /> at my <st data-num="06440" class="">presence</st>. The <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> will <st data-num="02040" class="">topple</st>, the <st data-num="04095" class="">cliffs</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="02346" class="">wall</st> will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> to the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st>.
I will call for a sword to attack Gog on all my mountains, declares the Sovereign Lord; every man’s sword will be against his brother.

I will <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st> him with <st data-num="01698" class="">plague</st> and <st data-num="01818" class="">bloodshed</st>. I will <st data-num="04305" class="">rain down</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> him, his <st data-num="0102" class="">troops</st>, and the <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him a <st data-num="07857" class="">torrential</st> <st data-num="01653" class="">downpour</st>, <st data-num="068 0417">hailstones</st>, <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>, and <st data-num="01614" class="">brimstone</st>.
I will exalt and magnify myself; I will reveal myself before many nations. Then they will know that I am the Lord.’
